patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2,4 +2,8 @@
 
 # [Choice] Java version (use -bullseye variants on local arm64/Apple Silicon): 11, 17, 11-bullseye, 17-bullseye, 11-buster, 17-buster
 ARG VARIANT="11-bullseye"
 FROM mcr.microsoft.com/vscode/devcontainers/java:0-${VARIANT}
+
+# [Option] Install Maven
+ARG INSTALL_MAVEN="true"
+ARG MAVEN_VERSION="3.8.6"
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -5,5 +5,7 @@
 FROM mcr.microsoft.com/vscode/devcontainers/java:0-${VARIANT}
 
 # [Option] Install Maven
 ARG INSTALL_MAVEN="true"
-ARG MAVEN_VERSION="3.8.6"
\ No newline at end of file
+ARG MAVEN_VERSION="3.8.6"
+
+RUN if [ "${INSTALL_MAVEN}" = "true" ]; then su vscode -c "umask 0002 && . /usr/local/sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh && sdk install maven \"${MAVEN_VERSION}\""; fi 
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,11 +1,14 @@
 # See here for image contents: https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-dev-containers/tree/v0.205.2/containers/java/.devcontainer/base.Dockerfile
 
 # [Choice] Java version (use -bullseye variants on local arm64/Apple Silicon): 11, 17, 11-bullseye, 17-bullseye, 11-buster, 17-buster
-ARG VARIANT="11-bullseye"
+ARG VARIANT="17-bullseye"
 FROM mcr.microsoft.com/vscode/devcontainers/java:0-${VARIANT}
 
 # [Option] Install Maven
 ARG INSTALL_MAVEN="true"
 ARG MAVEN_VERSION="3.8.6"
 
\ No newline at end of file
-RUN if [ "${INSTALL_MAVEN}" = "true" ]; then su vscode -c "umask 0002 && . /usr/local/sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh && sdk install maven \"${MAVEN_VERSION}\""; fi 
+RUN if [ "${INSTALL_MAVEN}" = "true" ]; then su vscode -c "umask 0002 && . /usr/local/sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh && sdk install maven \"${MAVEN_VERSION}\""; fi 
+
+# install clang for scala native
+#RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y install libXext.x86_64 libXrender.x86_64 libXtst.x86_64
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# See here for image contents: https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-dev-containers/tree/v0.205.2/containers/java/.devcontainer/base.Dockerfile

# [Choice] Java version (use -bullseye variants on local arm64/Apple Silicon): 11, 17, 11-bullseye, 17-bullseye, 11-buster, 17-buster
ARG VARIANT="11-bullseye"
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/vscode/devcontainers/java:0-${VARIANT}
